data.text: @LorneFinn @WhippsCrossHosp So glad you were able to get treatment and help at hospital. Rest well and hope you feel better soon.
@LorneFinn @WhippsCrossHosp Jeez, I'm glad you're keeping safe, well done for heading in when you need to.

Oof. Just back from hospital cos of a complication in my Covid. I don’t feel too bad, just really weak, sore chest and funny cold legs and head(?!) #Covid is still around people and I’m finding it so up & down. KEEP SAFE #Masks ✊🏼 BIG ❤️ to all the staff @WhippsCrossHosp I💙NHS https://t.co/7jWGyhNdFI
@LorneFinn Get well soon! I only got negative tests in day 14, it can really hang about 😷
